member.name: HTTP_SERVICE_CONFIG_SSL_SET
member.summary: TheHTTP_SERVICE_CONFIG_SSL_SET structure is used to add a new record to the SSL store or retrieve an existing record from it. An instance of the structure is used to pass data in to the function through the pConfigInformation parameter or to retrieve data from the function through the pOutputConfigInformation parameter when the ConfigId parameter of either function is equal to HTTPServiceConfigSSLCertInfo.

member.name: HTTP_SERVICE_CONFIG_SSL_SET.KeyDesc
member.summary: An structure that identifies the SSL certificate record.

member.name: HTTP_SERVICE_CONFIG_SSL_SET.ParamDesc
member.summary: An structure that holds the contents of the specified SSL certificate record.
